content.title: Welcome to DinoDen!
content.text:
Welcome and thanks for playing!
Press F1 to view this menu in the future.
Press F2 to view the shop. 
Press F3 to view Quests.
These are also in the radial menu for consoles players.
Console players have to use the shop via commands.
Please check out the other tabs that show our rates, information, etc

content.title: Rules
content.text:
All of these rules are subject to change
No hate speech, racism, etc
No bullying or abuse towards any players or admins.
This is an 18+ server, so there is no censorship, but keep it friendly.

No cheating, exploiting, hacking, bug abusing, etc.
No stealing from others, insiding, etc. If you make a trade or deal you must honor it.
One character / Tribe per account This rule is NOT because I care, but to prevent you from getting locked out of your tribe/char due to the transfer system.

content.title: PvE Specific Rules
content.text:
No excessive bases. Try to keep it to 1 or 2 per map.
No building at any important locations. Examples are :
Artifacts, drops, caves, etc. Everyone must have equal access to these things.
If you build a structure near anything important, it must have a public teleporter and be unlocked.
No excessive building spam / traps. Pick up after yourself!
Public traps in places that warrant them are okay.
No griefing of any sort!
No aggressive dinos outside of your base.

content.title: PvP Specific Rules
content.text:
Max of 2 bases per map. Traps / teleporters are okay.
No meshing of any sort. Instant tribe wipe with likely chance of permanent bans if found.
Be respectful and keep your toxicity to yourself. Do NOT bring it into this discord.
Rules & Balance changes are to be expected while we flesh out our pvp.

content.title: Server Rates
content.text:
Rates:
5x XP
3x Gather
1.5x Resource health
6x Taming (3x rates, but food drains at 2.8x)
10x Dino mature speed
8 hour mating cooldown
100x Egg Hatch
3x faster passive tame feedings
3x Crop Growth
14 day decay timers (Synced between maps / clusters)
3x Corpse life (90 minutes)
3x Fishing Loot
2x Loot crate quality
10,000 stack sizes

Health x2 = 20 per level
Stamina x5 = 50 per level
Oxygen x20 = 200 per level
Food x10 = 100 per level
Water x10 = 100 per level
Weight x10 = 100 per level
Melee x2 = 10% per level
Speed x1.6 = 2.4% per level (Capped at 136%)
Fortitude x2 = 4 per level
Crafting x194 = 1940% per level (Capped at 1 point)

content.title: Additional Info
content.text:
PvE Griefing prevention (Can't steal eggs, drag bodies, mate dinos)
Higher level dino spawns plugin.
Cross-Server & Cross-Cluster chat.
All items transferrable! Transfer backups (no losing characters!)
Increase mating range
Auto learn Engrams (Use /engrams if there is an issue)
Quests & Daily/Weekly Quests! Check the Quests tab for more info!
Solo Farm! (Type /farm to start / stop then carry the dino)
Dino Speed enabled! (Capped at 10 points)
Tons of QOL Mods!
All custom cosmetics allowed
Cloud Dedicated Storage! (Cross-Server Dedicated Storage)
Dino Variant cross breeding! (Breed Regular, Tek, Aberrant, etc together! It's bugged atm and will have a higher mating cooldown.)
So much more & even more to come!
If you think I should add anything else here please let me know

content.title: Commands
content.text:
Shop
/points - See your current points balance
/shop <Page>. See different pages of the shop.
/buy <ID> <Amount> - Buy an item from the shop
/kit to list all kits, /kit <KitName> to redeem one of them
/buykit <KitName> <Amount>. - Buys a kit. 
/trade <'CharacterName'> <Amount> - Sends Points to a player.

Solo Farm
/farm - This toggles the dino you're looking at to attack. Optionally specify 0-6 to pick which attack to use.
/stopall - this will stop all dinos from auto farming.

Chat
/pm <'playername'> <message> - example : "/pm 'DinoDen' hi"
/r <msg> - This replies to the most recent pm
/tribelog <webhook url> - This allows you to send tribe logs to discord. Feel free to ask for help setting it up!

Dino Commands
/cg - Change's Gender of a dino for 1500 points
/rename <name> - Changes all nearby dino names
/imprint - Imprints a dino for 1500 points
/grow - Fully grows a dino for 2000 points
/destroybabies <range> - Kills claimed babies in a radius (0-900)
/claimbabies <range> - Claims babies in a radius (0-900)

content.title: Other Info
content.text:
Quests
You can press F3 or access it via the radial menu.
Daily quests - Points ranging from 100 - 2000
Weekly Quests - Points ranging from 100 - 2000 & 2 random potions
Quest Chains - Rewards are different per chain, but mostly consist of potions, points, temporary VIP roles.
